channel.title: Chark on Sutkus Audio
channel.description: Recent content in Chark on Sutkus Audio

item.title: Exergale: audio in game
item.author: rokas@sutkusaudio.com (Rokas Sutkus)
item.description: This year, I’ve been neck-deep in two projects, putting in loads of work, and truth be told, it’s been so hectic that I’ve neglected this blog for quite a while. But hey, better late than never, right? Let me tell you about one of those projects, ExerGale, a VR game that’s all about flying, gliding, and climbing through a fantastic world. Right now, the game offers two modes: one where you can just soar around like a bird, and another where you hit a button and go on a crystal-collecting spree to rack up a high score.
